titleStmt.title: A Full and impartial account of all the secret consults, negotiations, stratagems, and intriegues of the Romish party in Ireland, from 1660, to this present year 1689, for the settlement of popery in that kingdom

notesStmt.note: Three names blotted out on p. 144.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Imperfect: half-title page with title: The secret intriegues of the Romish party in Ireland ([2] p. at beginning) lacking in filmed copy.
